summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1993, for the improvement of 22nd Avenue, from East Olive Street to East Madison Street, by grading, curbing and by constructing concrete sidewalks, sewers and water mains, with all appurtenances necessary for the proper drainage, sewerage, water service and fire protection of said district; under Ordinance No. 20398 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
